lines.text:
[Commenting on a large-nosed Italian girl]
Mack, I don't care what you say. I'm not going out with her!
Why, there's nothing wrong with her. She's got a mighty trim little hull.
But I can't see past her bowsprit!
Well, maybe she's built for speed?

[looking at a plus-sized Italian girl on a boat]
What big eyes you have, Grandma!
You hit a Limey and you hit a Marine all at the same time. What could be sweeter?
Now that's what I call efficiency.

[Speaking to Italian girl with Ptomaine]
Don't let that big nose fool you!

[commenting on their new commanding officer]
Boy, he acts like he wrote the book of regulations.
No, but he lives up to it, and he'll see that you do too. Yes, sir, that's "Dead Pan" Toler. If he smiles, it's only a gas pain.
What's that lump on your face, Yank?
Bunker Hill. You want to climb it?
Well, I don't see no steps.
